headline: Biogen Receives Health Canada Authorization for ZURZUVAE™ (zuranolone), the First and Only Treatment Indicated for Adults with Postpartum Depression in Canada
summary: TORONTO, December 09, 2025--Biogen Canada Inc. today announced that Health Canada has issued a Notice of Compliance (NOC) for ZURZUVAE™ (zuranolone) for the treatment of moderate or severe postpartum depression (PPD) in adults following childbirth. ZURZUVAE is a once-daily, 14-day oral single course treatment for women with PPD. This first-of-its-kind treatment offers relief from depressive symptoms, with benefits seen in clinical studies as early as day 3, significant reduction of symptoms by t
